scripts.prebuild: echo '=== PRE-BUILD DEBUG ===' && pwd && echo 'Node version:' && node -v && echo 'NPM version:' && npm -v && echo 'TypeScript version:' && npx tsc -v && echo 'Source files:' && find src -name '*.ts' 2>/dev/null || echo 'No src folder'
scripts.build: echo '=== BUILDING ===' && npx tsc --version && npx tsc && echo '=== BUILD RESULT ===' && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='./dist';if(fs.existsSync(p)){console.log('dist contents:');fs.readdirSync(p).forEach(f=>console.log(f));}else{console.log('No dist folder created');}"
scripts.prestart: echo '=== PRE-START DEBUG ===' && pwd && echo 'All files in backend:' && ls -la && echo 'Dist folder check:' && test -d dist && echo 'Dist exists' || echo 'Dist missing' && echo 'Server.js check:' && test -f dist/server.js && echo 'server.js exists' || echo 'server.js missing'
